attributes.action: Change the current system for action against fraud as It's completely broken
attributes.additional_details: People are losing billions a year to fraud and nothing is being done. Action fraud, being a centralised and privatised fraud department, receive over 25000 fraud cases a month. This in itself is ridiculous as they are completely overwhelmed. Before 2013, there was a national effort built up of every local police force, able to act independently against fraud. This national effort was more effective than the current centralised system of action fraud, which is completely overloaded & ineffective.
attributes.background: Recently I was a victim of financial fraud, which I tried to take action against, but have been completely rejected by my bank, the criminals bank, the local police forces, Action Fraud. No one could do anything about this fraud, despite having all the evidence to support it. I'm not alone here.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We understand that you don't think the current system of tackling fraud is working, but we aren't sure what you would like to happen instead.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to abolish Action Fraud and allow individual police forces to establish their own fraud reporting systems if that is something you would like to see happen.
